item.title: ICOM6045 Web Security - SSL/TLS
item.description: HTTP Basics HTTP messages HTTP messages are requests sent from clients to servers, and responses from servers to clients HTTP message structure start line 0 or more headers, each header contains field name, colon, field value optional message body HTTP request start line: request method GET HEAD POST PUT DELETE HTTP response start line: status line, contains HTTP version used by the server status code 200 -> ok 404 -> not found 401 -> unauthorized 403 -> forbidden reason phrase HTTP cache security issues
